snippet.title: Detective Dotson Gameplay!
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2450840/Detective_Dotson/

Welcome to the world of Detective Dotson! 
Dive into a high-stakes detective journey set against the vibrant backdrop of modern-day India. Not just a game, but also a captivating series! Watch thrilling episodes and then jump right into the action, taking on missions that put your detective skills to the test. Don the perfect disguise, employ handy tools, and team up to crack cases. With pixel characters set in a hyper-realistic 3D India, every choice you make shapes the story. Ready for the adventure? Wishlist Detective Dotson on Steam!
